prompts: Generate a legendary ice-type Pokemon with sharp, icy features and glowing blue patterns.
Imagine a powerful dragon that combines elements of steel and ice, with fierce wings and a majestic presence.
Create a Pokemon resembling a giant creature made of ice, showcasing vibrant accents and a formidable stance.
Design a mythical Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter, featuring intricate patterns and a mystical aura.
Make an imposing Pokemon that stands tall with a strong, muscular build, surrounded by a frost-like mist.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of ice and dragon traits, emphasizing its regal and intimidating nature.
Give me an image of a unique ice-type Pokemon that exhibits both elegance and strength in its design.
